data.actual_result: Nothing happens when clicking on it.
data.expected_result: You should be able to open the dropdown menu.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] [iPad only] Dropdown menu cannot be opened
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: make sure you are using your iPad in landscape mode - Go to the Discord website - Click on the top navigation bar to open a dropdown menu of pages (e.g. Support)
